title: (x) Friends of the Oakland Animal Shelter glyphic sans - Lithos {Lex}
content:
Ugly, but familiar typeface... Any help?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415184210im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FOAS_logo_3520.jpg)
author: cchs

comments.content:
The sample is small, but it looks like Lithos maybe.

- Lex
bingo. I just couldn't remember! Thanks!

Why would you describe it as "ugly"? It may not be [Carol Twombly's](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415184210/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Carol%20Twombly%27s) best face, but I quite like it in certain uses -- in fact, I recently did a brochure that combined Lithos with Tiepolo and it was a big hit with the client....
I don't know if I'd call it "ugly", but I'd _never_ use it. I think it's a cultural thing.
(Note to self: never use Lithos in work for Belgian clients.) ;-)
